issue.title: [Rust] The Rust README should include Rust-specific information on contributing
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2560](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2560). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Every new contributor has their first build fail because they didn't know to use cargo fmt.

We should explain this in the Rust README along with any other pertinent information specific to Rust contributions.
